0.1.name: wordpress/custom-unit-converter
0.1.description:
Simple measurement converter widget. There is a possibility to add custom units in admin area and disable or delete units.

Here are the Measurements and units included as presets: * Angle - units Degree, Gradian, Radian * Area - units Acres, Hectares, Square centimeter, Square feet, square inch, square kilometer, square meters, square mile, square millimeter, square yard * Length - meter, centimeter, millimeter, foot, inch, rod, yard, mile, nautical mile * Temperature - Celsius, Fahrenheit, Kelvin * Volume Fluid - fluid ounce UK, fluid ounce US, Gallon UK and US, Pint UK and US, liter, quart UK and US, milliliter * Volume Solid - cubic centimeter, cubic meter, cubic feet, cubic inch, cubic yard * Weight - gram, kilogram, ounce, pound, stone
